org.apache.hadoop.hbase.test

类 MetricsAssertHelperImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.test.MetricsAssertHelperImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MetricsAssertHelper

    public class MetricsAssertHelperImpl
extends Object
implements MetricsAssertHelper
    A helper class that will allow tests to get into hadoop2's metrics2 values.
